body_1.text:
It's your duty to speak up when you become aware of any violations of insider trading policy and laws. Remember, even innocent mistakes should be reported.


If you are unsure at to whether a potential decision or action could be a violation, or who to contact for advice, a list of contacts is available here.

body_2.text:
You need to:

  • Speak up and do so immediately.
  • Know who to speak to.
  • Recognize that even if an error is made in good faith, it must be reported.
  • Recognize that you are responsible for protecting yourself and our company.
  • Admit when you have done something wrong, even if it was in error.
  • Ask for help with questions about trading in company stock or stock of another company.
